name: BestFriend
0:
”Alexa, tell best friend make my day better”
”Alexa, tell best friend i need to hear something nice”
”Alexa, tell best friend i had a bad day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: best friend
des: Best Friend, is your virtual best friend. Having a bad day, tell Best Friend, and Best Friend will respond with something nice. Need a confidence booster before you head out for the day, Best Friend has your back. Best Friend randomly generates compliments when you need to hear one. Feel better after a long day, get a boost of confidence before a presentation, or a general self esteem boost on a blah day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
